overview: Mike Coleman is currently the Director of Technology at Gazette Communications in Cedar Rapids, Iowa. A multi-format, multi-product media company, Gazette Communications technology disciplines range from state-of-the-art commercial press and broadcast systems to cutting edge web and social networking tools. Mike came to Gazette Communications after 2 Â½ decades of service in the United States Marine Corps as a Communications Officer, bringing with him a wide array of experience supporting all facets of small and large organizations in peace and during multiple combat tours, to include finishing his military career as the Head of the Networks Branch for the CIO of the Marine Corps. His reorganization efforts, agnostic approach to technology resources and leadership in seeking efficiencies in processes and operating expenses have created a more open and agile information environment. Mike is involved with community programs, supporting youth baseball, music programs and volunteering his time and talent towards better neighborhoods and flood recovery of the Cedar Rapids area.
